events.name: Hawaii 2016!
events.description: Summer vacation on the Big Island of Hawaii.

events.name: Hawaii 2015
events.linkText: Check out more photos from this event.
events.description: This was an activity packed trip to Kaui.  Lots of fun in the pool, on the beach and on choo choo trains.  Can't wait to do it again.

events.name: Christmas 2014
events.linkText: Check out more photos from this event.
events.description: Ethan and Jayden celebrated Christmas three times this year.  First with the Solis family, then with the Suen family and then headed down to LA to celebrate with the Chan family.  It's been a fun filled holiday season!

events.name: Taking Advantage of a Rainy Day
events.description: What's more fun than playing in the rain!

events.name: We're TWO!
events.linkText: Check out more photos from this event.
events.description: A fun filled afternoon at Lake Elizabeth hanging out with friends and family.  We jumped in the bounce house all afternoon.

events.name: Hawaii 2014!
events.linkText: Check out more photos from this event.
events.description: Another fabulous family vacation in Oahu and Maui.  Ethan and Jayen couldn't get enough of the water.

events.name: Sammy's 3rd Birthday Party!
events.linkText: Check out more photos from this event.
events.description: A fun filled afternoon at Lemos farm in Half Moon Bay to celebrate cousin Sammy's 3rd Birthday.  Ethan and Jayden had a blast.

events.name: Bust a move!
events.description: Let Ethan and Jayden show you the latest and greatest dance moves.

events.name: 2013 Holiday Season
events.linkText: Check out more photos from this event.
events.description: Happy Holidays everyone!  We had plenty of family gatherings during the holiday season.

events.name: Halloween 2013
events.linkText: Check out more photos from this event.
events.description: The Fox and the Monkey go trick-or-treating.

events.name: Our Life
events.description: Video of Ethan and Jayden's first year!

events.name: Practice
events.description: If at first your don't succeed, dust yourself off and try again.  Jayden has been standing steadly for quite sometime, but on Sept 5th, he took his first steps.  Now him and his brother are practicing together.

events.name: Baby Steps
events.description: Ethan took his FIRST steps today!!  He just decided to let go and start walking.  Everytime he does it, he has the bigest smile on his face like he knows he's accomplished something big.

events.name: Calling all my peeps!
events.description: Jayden's got a lot of important phone calls to make. We apologize for any crank calls and cryptic text messages he's made.

events.name: Our First Birthday Party!
events.linkText: Check out more photos from our special day.
events.description: Many of our friends and family came out to celebrate Ethan and Jayden's first birthday.  They had so much fun eating, playing and hanging out with people.

events.name: Happy Babies #2
events.description: This happens on a nightly basis at dinner time.  They've grown a lot, but at 11 months, one thing hasn't changed...they are still happy babies.

events.name: Our first vacation
events.linkText: Check out more photos from our trip.
events.description: Our first family vacation to Hawaii.  The boys were a star on the plane.  They loved the pool but were not a fan of the beach.

events.name: I finally caught up
events.description: About 3 weeks after Ethan started crawling, Jayden figured it out too.  His style is a bit unconventional, but it gets him where he wants to go.

events.name: Look who's crawling
events.description: After weeks of rocking back and forth on all four's, Ethan figured out how to crawl.  Video taken with daddy's new toy... the GoPro camera

events.name: Hanging out with Auntie Suzie and Auntie Michelle
events.description: Auntie Suzie and Auntie Michelle came over to play on Cinco de Mayo.

events.name: Aunt Suzie
events.description: Auntie Suzie can handle twins...no problem.  One baby will be a piece of cake! ;)

events.name: Chillin
events.description: Getting held all day long.  What a great Sunday!

events.name: Laughing at Grandma
events.description: Jayden is cracking up at the way Grandma sneezes

events.name: Hawaiian Hunks
events.description: Hawaiian hunks hanging out in the their birthday suit.

events.name: Beautiful Day
events.linkText: Check out more photos from the day and from the last few months.
events.description: It was a beautiful day to be outside.  Aunt Pam, Aunt Patty, Mia and Chasen came over to play.

events.name: Two little monkeys
events.description: Ethan and Jayden playing together in their crib

events.name: Slap Jack
events.description: Jayden playing a silly game with dad.

events.name: Happy Babies
events.description: Daddy makes funny kissing sounds.

events.name: Hanging with my SB Aunties
events.description: Meeting some of my UCSB Aunties for the first time.

events.name: Auntie Annalyn
events.description: Who's that pretty lady holding me.  I can get used to this.

events.name: Arrival of Ethan and Jayden
events.linkText: Check out photos from the event here
events.description: Ethan and Jayden have finally arrived.  Born August 9th, 2012!!

events.name: Baby Shower with Tennis Friends
events.linkText: Check out photos from the event here
events.description: I have the best teammates in the world.  Special thanks to Lynley, Lien and Tammy for putting this together.

events.name: Baby Shower
events.linkText: Check out photos from the event here
events.description: Ethan and Jayden enjoyed their baby shower.  They loved seeing all their friends and family.  They especially love all the gifts they got.

events.name: Baby Room
events.description: The decorations for the baby room is finally complete.  Special thanks to Yvonne for the banner.
